name: Holger Czukay
description: '''Holger Schüring''' (24 March 1938 – 5 September 2017), known professionally as '''Holger Czukay''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|ʃ|ʊ|k|aɪ}}), was a German musician who co-founded the [[krautrock]] group [[Can (band)|Can]]. Described as "successfully bridg[ing] the gap between [[pop music|pop]] and the [[avant-garde music|avant-garde]]", Czukay also created early important examples of [[ambient music]], explored "[[world music]]" well before the term was coined, and was a pioneer of [[sampling (music)|sampling]].
